entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: NW 37 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
